body:
Thanks for the explanation @ngimel . Do C side doubles always get rounded to 14 precision in pytorch? If so, should we allow float rand/uniform to output 1?

I also never seem to get 0 from `torch.rand(100000000).min()`. Do you know the reason?

For the CUDA side, would `x != 1 ? x : 0` be a reasonable thing to do?
